full_text:
CUSTOMERS LIABLE.

	The sanitation equipment charge imposed by this article shall be a joint and several charge against the occupants and the owner of each dwelling unit subject to the charge.

1.name: Solid Waste Collection, Transfer, Recycling, Recovery Of Waste Resources And Disposal Fee
1.label: article

3.catch_line: Billing, Collection And Payment Of Charges.

next_section.catch_line: Billing, Collection And Payment Of Charges.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

CUSTOMERS LIABLE. (§ 66.42)

  CUSTOMERS LIABLE.	The sanitation equipment charge imposed by this article
shall be a joint and several charge against the occupants and the owner of each
dwelling unit subject to the charge.

CUSTOMERS LIABLE.

The sanitation equipment charge imposed by this article shall be a joint and several charge against the occupants and the owner of each dwelling unit subject to the charge.
